title: Shoot for the Stars, Aim for the Moon
summary: Shoot for the Stars, Aim for the Moon is the posthumously released debut studio album of American rapper Pop Smoke. It was released on July 3, 2020, by Victor Victor Worldwide and Republic Records, and a deluxe edition of the album that includes fifteen additional tracks—including remixes of three songs from the original—was released on July 20 that year, a date that would have been Pop Smoke's 21st birthday. It is a drill, trap, and R&B record.
